label: AB_tI24_141_ae_be-001
title: $\beta$-LiSn Structure
comments:
This is apparently the high-temperature structure of LiSn.  Below 470K LiSn is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_mP6_10_bn_cm-001}{monoclinic $\alpha$-LiSn structure} (Villars, 2018).
 We have shifted the origin so that a lithium atom is on the (4a) site.
